mapper.select: select * from ( select room_idx, review_idx, r.userid, write_date, r_title, review_content, review_star, g.profile_img from review r join guest g on r.userid = g.userid ) where room_idx=#{room_idx} order by review_idx desc
select count(*) from review where room_idx=#{room_idx}
select nvl(round(avg(review_star), 2),0.0) from review where room_idx=#{room_idx}
INSERT INTO Review(review_idx, room_idx, r_title, review_content) VALUES (Review_seq.nextval, 3, #{r_title}, #{review_content})

select * from ( select room_idx, review_idx, r.userid, write_date, r_title, review_content, review_star, (select room_name from rooms where r.room_idx=room_idx) as room_name, g.profile_img from review r join guest g on r.userid = g.userid ) where userid=#{userid} order by review_idx desc

select acc_idx, review_idx, userid, writer, acc_content, (select room_idx from review where a.review_idx=review_idx) room_idx, (select r_title from review where review_idx=a.review_idx) r_title from review_accuse a where writer = #{userid}

select * from ( select room_idx, review_idx, r.userid, write_date, r_title, review_content, review_star, (select room_name from rooms where r.room_idx=room_idx) as room_name, g.profile_img from review r join guest g on r.userid = g.userid ) where room_idx=#{room_idx} order by review_idx desc
